
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/18962574" title="发布于 2025-07-02 23:40">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">最新版uniapp+vue3+uv-ui跨三端短视频+直播+聊天【H5+小程序+App端】</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 宋体, &quot;Songti SC&quot;; color: rgba(51, 102, 255, 1)">原创<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 255, 1)">uni-app+vue3+pinia2+uv-ui</span>实战<strong>仿抖音app小视频+直播+聊天</strong>系统。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><strong>uni-vue3-welive</strong>：最新研发<span style="background-color: rgba(255, 255, 153, 1)">uniapp+vue3</span>从0-1实战搭建仿抖音/微信直播带货商城。集<span style="color: rgba(255, 153, 0, 1)"><strong>短视频+聊天+直播</strong></span>功能于一体。实现<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 204, 1)">全屏沉浸式切换短视频/直播</span>，支持编译运行到<strong>h5+小程序端+app端</strong>。</span></p>
<h3>运行效果</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">编译到<strong>小程序+h5+app端</strong>效果如下：</span></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702221644371-1273175551.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>技术栈</h3>
<ul>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">编辑器：HbuilderX 4.66</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">框架技术：Uniapp+Vue3+Vite5+Nvue+Pinia2</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">UI组件库：uv-ui+vk-uview</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">弹框组件：uaPopup（uniapp封装多端弹框组件）</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">自定义组件：uaNavbar+uaTabbar组件</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">本地缓存：pinia-plugin-unistorage</span></li>
<li><span style="font-size: 12px">编译支持：h5+小程序+APP端</span></li>
</ul>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702221922065-642392817.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702222204084-1847949639.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">uni-vue3-welive实现丝滑般滑动体验，全屏沉浸式tabbar切换，微型迷你拖拽播放时间进度条等功能。</span></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702222949518-645512129.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702223843927-2145195854.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>项目框架结构</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">使用<strong>uni-app+vue3</strong>搭建项目框架，采用<strong>vue3 setup</strong>语法编码开发。</span></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702224431047-1822448283.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<blockquote>
<h3>目前uniapp-welive短视频直播项目已经同步到我的原创作品集。</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a href="https://mall.bilibili.com/neul-next/detailuniversal/detail.html?isMerchant=1&amp;page=detailuniversal_detail&amp;saleType=10&amp;itemsId=11190508&amp;loadingShow=1&amp;noTitleBar=1&amp;msource=merchant_share" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">uni-app+vue3+pinia2+uv-ui跨三端短视频+聊天+直播商城</a></span></p>
</blockquote>

<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702225549333-1126410553.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>uniapp跨端自定义navbar+tabbar组件</h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">在components目录下自定义navbar、tabbar组件。</span></p>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2023.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202401/1289798-20240101103712172-337234755.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">之前有过一篇分享文章，感兴趣的话也可以去看看，这里就不详细的介绍实现过程了。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/14978408.html" target="_blank">https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/14978408.html</a></span></p>
<h3>uniapp+vue3短视频模块</h3>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702231614932-901103364.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">短视频模块采用全屏沉浸式上下无缝衔接滑动效果。整体分为<strong>顶部固定tabs+视频区+底部视频信息浮层</strong>三大模块。</span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ua-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper
            </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-wrap flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            :current</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="currentVideo"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            vertical
            :circular</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            :duration</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="200"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            @change</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleChange"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            @transition</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleTransition"</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-for</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="(item, index) in videoList"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :key</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="index"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">video
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-player flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="'uplayer' + index"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.src"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :danmu-list</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.danmu"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :enable-danmu</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :controls</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :loop</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :autoplay</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="index == currentVideo"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :show-center-play-btn</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    object-fit</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="contain"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleClickVideo"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    @play</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="isPlaying=true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    @timeupdate</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleTimeUpdate"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'width': `${winWidth}px`, 'height': `${winHeight}px`}"</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">video</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 浮层模块 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__video-float__info flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="flexbox flex-row flex-alignb"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 左侧 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="vdinfo__left flex1 flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ltrow danmu flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenDanmu"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="danmu-txt"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>弹<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ico"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="edit-pen"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="14"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ltrow"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ait"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>@{{item.author}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ltrow"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="desc"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.desc}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 右侧操作栏 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="vdinfo__right flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rtbtn avatar flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ubox"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">image </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="uimg"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.avatar"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> mode</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="aspectFill"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'active': item.isFollow}"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleFollow(index)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.isFollow ? 'checkmark' : 'plus'"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.isFollow ? '#ff007f' : '#fff'"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="11"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rtbtn flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleLiked(index)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="heart-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.isLike ? '#ff007f' : '#fff'"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="40"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="num"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.likeNum+(item.isLike ? 1 : 0)}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rtbtn flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenComment(index)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="chat-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="40"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="num"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.replyNum}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rtbtn flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="star-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="40"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="num"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.starNum}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rtbtn flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenShare(index)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="share-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="40"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="num"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.shareNum}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 固定tabs(脱离滑动区) </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__video-header__tabs"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'margin-top': `${menuBarT}px`}"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-tabs </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:current</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="tabsCurrent"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :list</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="tabsList"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 播放暂停按钮 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="!isPlaying"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-playbtn"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'left': `${winWidth/2}px`, 'top': `${winHeight/2}px`}"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleClickVideo"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-playico welive-icon welive-icon-play nvueicon"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 播放mini进度条 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="sliderValue &gt; 0"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-slider"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">slider
                </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:value</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="sliderValue"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                :step</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="sliderStep"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                :max</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="sliderMaxValue"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                activeColor</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                backgroundColor</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rgba(255,255,255,.2)"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                block-color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#fff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                block-size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="6"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                @changing</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="onSliderChanging"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                @change</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="onSliderChange"</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">#footer</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ua-tabbar </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">bgcolor</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="transparent"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rgba(255,255,255,.7)"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :border</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :dock</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> transparent z-index</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="1000"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ua-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702231915208-1096141902.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 监听播放进度条</span>
const handleTimeUpdate = (e) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
    let { currentTime, duration } </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> e.detail
    sliderValue.value </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> currentTime
    sliderMaxValue.value </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> duration
    sliderStep.value </span>= currentTime /<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> duration
}

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 滑动条拖动中</span>
const onSliderChanging = (e) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
    sliderValue.value </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> e.detail.value
    handlePause()
}

</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 滑动条拖动结束</span>
const onSliderChange = (e) =&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {
    sliderValue.value </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> e.detail.value
    let video </span>=<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> getVideoContext()
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">if</span>(!video) <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">return</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
    video.seek(sliderValue.value)
    handlePlay()
}</span></pre>
</div>
<h3>uniapp+vue3仿微信app聊天模块</h3>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702233034279-1278786414.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">聊天功能模块是之前uniapp+vue3仿微信app聊天项目的迁移模块。如果对聊天项目感兴趣，可以去看看下面这篇分享文章。</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/18165578" target="_blank">uniapp+vue3聊天室|uni-app+vite4+uv-ui跨端仿微信app聊天语音/朋友圈</a></span></p>
<p><img alt="" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702232248543-677523878.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>uni-app+vue3直播模块</h3>
<p><img alt="" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202507/1289798-20250702232522310-1147536811.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">直播模块整体分为<strong>顶部信息+直播流视频区+滚动消息(加入直播间+送礼物+讲解商品)+底部工具栏</strong></span></p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ua-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper
            </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-wrap flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            :current</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="currentLive"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
            vertical
            @change</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleChange"</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-for</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="(item, index) in liveList"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :key</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="index"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">video
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ua__swipervideo-player flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :id</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="'uplayer' + index"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.src"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :controls</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :loop</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :autoplay</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="index == currentLive"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :show-center-play-btn</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="false"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    object-fit</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="contain"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
                    :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'width': `${winWidth}px`, 'height': `${winHeight}px`}"</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">video</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 浮层模块 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__swiperscreen flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :current</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="1"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 清屏 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
                        第一屏
                    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 顶部区域 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__headlayer"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{'top': menuBarT+'px'}"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> logo+关注 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__hd-liveinfo flexbox flex-row flex-alignc"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__hd-avatar ulive__mask flex-alignc"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 加入直播间/送礼物提示 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>

                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__ft-livewrap-animatejoin ulive__ft-livewrap-placeholder"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="joinRoomData"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__ft-livewrap-joinroom"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__ft-livewrap-joinroom__text"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>欢迎{{joinRoomData}}加入了直播间<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

                                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">image </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="gimg"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="item.poster"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> mode</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="aspectFill"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
                                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="waves"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="c-fff fs-24"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>讲解中<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="close"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click.stop</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="isVisibleGoodsTalk=false"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="close-circle-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="rgba(0, 0, 0, .3)"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="14"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ginfo flexbox flex-col"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="clamp1 fs-24"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{item.desc}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="clamp1 fs-24 c-eb4868"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>7天无理由退货<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox flex-row"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="flex1 c-fff fs-28"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>￥79.00<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="qiang"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>抢<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 工具栏 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="ulive__ft-livewrap-toolbar flexbox flex-row"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="editorwrap flex1 flexbox flex-row flex-alignc"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="flex1"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenChatbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="editorwrap-text"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>说点什么...<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btnwrap flexbox flex-row"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenMenus"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="grid"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#3c9cff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="22"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenGoods(item)"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="shopping-cart-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#ffaa00"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="24"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleOpenGifts"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="gift"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#ff0ad3"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="22"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="btn flexbox"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-icon </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">name</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="more-dot-fill"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#efe9ff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="18"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
                <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
            <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper-item</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
        <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">swiper</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">ua-layout</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<p>综上就是uni-app+vue3+uv-ui搭建跨三端短视频+聊天+直播app应用的一些知识分享。希望对大家有些帮助！</p>
